text:
Why is our state Attorney General @AGRobBonta @RobBonta  (who was just appointed by Newsom, BTW) saying that the #CArecall will fail b/c "they have to go through us, and they're not going to get there b/c we have a labor movement"?

Hardly neutral.

https://t.co/ntvLtZDkz6 https://t.co/1dGEFEtyau
